item.title: Hungry Worms Could Help Solve Plastic Pollution
item.description: Researchers are working on manipulating wax worms’ digestive systems to create a scalable way of disposing of plastic.

item.title: Hungry Worms Could Help Solve Plastic Pollution

item.title: Government Staffing Cuts Have Fueled an Ant-Smuggling Boom
item.description: “It’s getting out of hand,” one seller says. “They realize the US market is a gold mine.”
